summary: Audited 33 sorries across 8 files in Metalogic/. Only 1 sorry (soundness axiom) is critical - the semantic_weak_completeness theorem is already sorry-free. Most sorries are architectural limitations or on alternative paths.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive audit categorizing sorries as (a) critical: 1 soundness sorry, (b) secondary: 21 sorries on alternative paths, (c) exploratory: 13 cross-origin/compositionality sorries. Includes priority ranking and implementation recommendations.
